gold.user: A user wants to retrieve the add-on results for a specific recording identified by its ReferenceSid and Sid. They have the necessary AccountSid and want to ensure they get the correct data for analysis.
gold.ideal: The API should return a JSON object containing the details of the add-on results for the specified recording, including any relevant metadata.

gold.user: A user needs to delete a specific add-on result associated with a recording. They have the AccountSid, ReferenceSid, and Sid of the add-on result they wish to remove.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the specified add-on result and return a success message or status code indicating the operation was successful.

gold.user: A user wants to list all add-on results for a particular recording. They have the AccountSid and ReferenceSid and are looking to gather insights from all associated add-on results.
gold.ideal: The API should return a JSON array containing all add-on results for the specified recording, including details such as Sid, status, and any relevant data.
